THIS PAGE CONTAINS THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS TO THE SUNFEAST FANTASTIK DUMP YOUR EXCESS CONTEST Terms and conditions ABOUT THE CONTEST 1. The “Sunfeast Fantastik Dump Your Excess” (the “Contest”) is organised by ITC Limited (“ITC”). 2. Consumers participating or seeking to participate in the Contest shall individually be referred to as “Participant” and collectively as “Participants”. 3. If you are a Participant below the age of 18 years, your parent(s)/legal guardian hereby provide consent on your behalf to enter into the Contest and to stand a chance to win prizes as per the terms & conditions set forth herein. Failure to provide such consent will result in disqualification from this Contest. 4. Participation in this Contest is purely voluntary. By participating in this Contest, each Participant is deemed to have accepted the complete terms and conditions of this Contest available on https://sunfeastfantastik.com/dumpyourexcess.html as well as the decisions of ITC, which are final and binding in all matters related to the Contest. Successfully entering the Contest and winning a prize is subject to all requirements set forth herein. 5. ITC reserves right to terminate, modify or extend this Contest, at its absolute discretion, without assigning any reason whatsoever including extending, withdrawing, or discontinuing the same without notice, at its sole and absolute discretion and without any liability. All decisions of ITC in respect of the Contest and the prizes therein will be final and binding. 6. The Contest shall be live from 00:00 hours on Febraury 7th, 2025 and end at 11:59 hours on Febraury 14th, 2025[ES1] 7. The Contest is subject to all applicable central, state and local laws and regulations. 8. Purchase of the Sunfeast Fantastik 4D pack is not required to participate in this Contest. 9. The Contest shall be run on the sunfeastfantastik Instagram profile and the Fantastik website available on https://sunfeastfantastik.com/dumpyourexcess.html 10. This Contest is in no way sponsored, endorsed, administed by or associated with Instagram. Each Participant is deemed to have released Instagram from any claims and liabilities that may specifically arise in relation to their participation in this Contest by accepting these terms & conditions. ELIGIBILITY 11. Only Indian citizens residing in India are eligible to participate in this Contest. Participants below the age of 18 years can participate only with the consent of their parent(s)/legal guardian. 12. In order to be eligible for the prize, all Participants will be required to have valid address proof, government issued photo identity proof such as PAN Card/ Driver’s license/Voter ID/valid passport etc, or parent(s)/legal guardian’s consent, if applicable, a copy of which will have to be submitted at the request of ITC, without which the Participant will be disqualified from the Contest. 13. ITC reserves the right to exclude any person from the Contest on the grounds of: (i) misconduct or criminal record; (ii) tampering with the Entry process or the operation of Contest; (iii) acting in violation of these terms and conditions; (iv) acting in an unsportsmanlike or disruptive manner or with intent to annoy, abuse, threaten or harass any other person; or (v) for any other reasons, as it may deem fit and proper. No communication in this regard will be entertained. STEPS TO PARTICIPATE 14. To participate in the Contest, a Participants should follow the following steps: a) Participants may also enter into this Contest by visiting this portal ( https://sunfeastfantastik.com/dumpyourexcess.html ) and providing the comment on the portal. b) Participants who are below the age of 13 can participate using their parent(s)/legal guardian’s Instagram account. 15. Comments must inter alia comply with the following guidelines: a) All comments submitted must comply with these Terms & Conditions and terms of use of the Contest Website; b) Cannot be sexually explicit or suggestive, violent or derogatory of any ethnic, racial, gender, religious, professional or age group, profane or pornographic, or contain nudity; c) Cannot promote alcohol, illegal drugs, firearms/weapons (or the use of any of the foregoing), any activities that may appear unsafe or dangerous, or any particular political agenda or message; d) Cannot be obscene or offensive, endorse any form of hate or hate group; e) Cannot promote terrorist acts such as providing instructions on how to assemble bombs, grenades and other such weapons or provide instructional information about illegal activities; f) Cannot defame, misrepresent or contain disparaging or slanderous remarks about ITC, its customers or its products, or other people, products or companies; g) Must be original and cannot contain copyrighted materials owned by others (including photographs, sculptures, paintings and other works of art, stills, or images published on or in television, movies, the Internet or other media) without permission and cannot be plagiarized from any source; h) Cannot contain background artwork, unless it is an original work of the Participant; i) Cannot communicate messages or images inconsistent with the positive images and/or goodwill to which ITC wishes to associate; j) Cannot depict, and cannot itself, be in violation of any law. k) Participants making statements which are contrary to existing law, bye-laws, public policy or established good practices shall be disqualified from further participating in the Contest. SELECTION OF WINNERS 16. 4 winners will win a prize from ITC. 17. The winners will be chosen by judges appointed by the ITC Sunfeast Fantastik brand team based on the creativity of the comments. The decision of the judges shall be final and binding upon all the participants. PRIZE 18. For the purpose of this Contest, “Winners” mens Participants who have won the Prize. “Prize” means the Prize won by a Winner(s), details of which are elaborated in Clause 19 below. 19. “Prize”: Selected winners based on the most creative comments chosen as per ITC’s discretion will get to feature in an Instagram post or story (as chosen by ITC) at the end of the Contest period. CONTACTING WINNERS 20. Post the completion of the Contest, ITC shall contact each Participant who has won. ITC will inform the Participant by a message via Instagram that they have won the prize. The Winner is required to provide their mobile number and any other details as may be requested. These details are required for the Winner to be contacted. Without these details, the Winner shall stand disqualified from the Contest. 21. In the event the Winner does not respond to the message in 3 days, the Winner’s participation in the Contest comes to an end and the Winner’s entry stands cancelled and Winner becomes ineligible to receive the prize. In such an event, another Winner will be shortlisted by ITC. 22. The Winners will have to provide a copy of their or their parent(s)/legal guardian’s address proof such as valid passport, voter card, or driver’s license, a copy of which will have to be submitted at the request of ITC, without which the Participant may be disqualified from the Contest. 23. No Prize will be awarded if the information provided by the Participant at the time of entering the Contest is not factually correct. The prize will be awarded to the Winner only after the formalities mentioned herein are fulfilled. 24. The list of those Winners whose details have been verified shall be published at ( https://sunfeastfantastik.com/dumpyourexcess.html ) after the Contest, on 16 th Febraury date . 25. By sharing their/their parent(s)/legal guardian’s personal information with ITC, the Participants/their parent(s)/legal guardian consent to collection, storing, processing and use of personal information i.e. name, address, mobile phone number by ITC, its affiliates, associates, agents, contractors and other third parties. The personal information is being collected by [ES6] ITC and shall be retained by ITC. 26. Personal information given by the Participants/ their parent(s)/legal guardians shall be used to deliver prizes and for promotional activities by ITC Ltd its affiliates, associates, agents, contractors. 27. By participating in this Contest, the Participants/their parent(s)/legal guardians acknowledge and consent to transfer and/or disclosure of their personal information by ITC to any third-party for providing services in relation to this Contest. 28. The Participants have an option of not providing the personal information as required under this Contest. The Participants also have an option to withdraw their consent in relation to usage of Personal Information during the duration of the Contest. In such cases, the entry of the Participant shall not be considered and Participant shall not be eligible for the prize. The participants may reach out to ItcCares.Orm@associatemail.in for such withdrawals. PUBLICITY 29. The Participant undertakes and irrevocably and unconditionally permits ITC to cover the Contest through various media including newspapers, radio television news channels, internet, point of sale materials, etc., and shall not raise any objection, protest or demur to such coverage or in this regard. 30. At the request of ITC, Participants shall participate in all activities relating to the Contest surrounding the winning of the Prize, free of charge including participating in any photography/videography session, interviews etc., and they consent to ITC using their name and image in promotional material. 31. By participating in the Contest, all Participants agree that ITC shall be at liberty to use the Participant’s name and/or photo and/or video and/or entry and that may appear in any advertisements/promotions/media coverage or publicity in any form which exists today or will be known anytime in the future, without any consideration to the Participant and/or the Winners. No fees or other sums are to be paid to the Participants or Winners on account of taking part in the aforementioned advertisements / promotions and they shall not raise any objection, protest or demur to such coverage or in this regard. TERMS & CONDITIONS FOR THE PRIZE 32. The Prize Winner shall follow the instructions given by or on behalf of ITC, when a message is sent to him/her by ITC informing him/her in the event of his/her selection as the prize Winner. 33. Award of Prize is subject to the verification of documents such as (government Photo-ID proof such as valid Indian passport /residence proof/ Driver’s license PAN card and/or such other documents as may be requested and submitted by the prize Winner. After verification the prize Winner will be informed about the entire process of redemption of the Prize. GENERAL CONDITIONS 34. The decision of ITC, as regards the selection of Winners and distribution of the prizes shall be final, subject only to ITC’s approval. No correspondence or any other claims whatsoever, in this regard will be entertained. 35. All right, title and interest, including but not limited to, the intellectual property rights in the Contest and the promotional materials, all data collected as a result of this Contest and in any and all responses received shall vest solely and exclusively with ITC. ITC shall be entitled to use the responses received or any information in connection with the Entry in any media for future promotional, marketing, publicity and any other purpose without permission or payment to the Participant. 36. All material submitted in connection with the Contest are assigned to ITC upon submission and become of the property of ITC exclusively. ITC may use such material in the manner as it may deem fit. 37. ITC reserves the right to change, defer, alter or cancel this Contest in part or full, or change any or all of the terms and conditions that are applicable, without giving prior intimation/notice of any kind and will not be liable for any consequential losses/damages. Any decision of ITC in this regard and in general with respect to this Contest and the terms and conditions thereto shall be final, binding and non-contestable. 38. The decision of ITC shall be final in all regards and no communication shall be entertained in this regard. None of the provisions of these Terms and Conditions shall be deemed to constitute a partnership or agency between any Participant and ITC and the Participant shall not have the authority to bind ITC in any manner whatsoever. 39. ITC shall be accountable/liable for any disruptions/stoppages/interruptions or cancellation of the Contest due to any government restrictions. 40. Failure to exercise or delay in exercising a right or remedy provided hereunder or by law does not constitute a waiver of the right or remedy or waiver of other rights or remedies on the part of ITC. 41. ITC accepts no responsibility for loss of internet connectivity, claims or correspondence whether due to error, omission, alteration, tampering, unauthorized data hacking, deletion, theft, destruction, virus attack, transmission interruption, communications failure, hardware failure or otherwise. ITC shall not be liable for any consequences of user error including (without limitation) costs incurred. RELEASE AND LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY 42. ITC shall under no circumstances be liable, whether jointly or severally, for any loss or damage suffered or sustained (including but not limited to consequential loss), including for personal injury or property damage suffered or sustained or any costs incurred, as a result of acceptance of any Prize. 43. By entering the Contest, the Participant hereby releases from and agrees to indemnify ITC and/ or any of its respective officers/employees from and against all liability, cost, loss or expense arising out of acceptance of the prize or participation in the Contest including (but not limited to) personal injury and damage to property and whether direct, indirect, consequential, foreseeable, due to some negligent act or omission, or otherwise. 44. ITC accepts no liability, whether jointly or severally, for any errors or omissions, whether on behalf of itself, or third parties in relation to the prizes. DISPUTES 45. The courts of competent jurisdiction at Bengaluru shall have exclusive jurisdiction to determine any and all disputes arising out of, or in connection with the Contest. 46. Further all issues and questions concerning the construction, validity, interpretation and enforceability of these terms and conditions, or the rights and obligations of the Participants and/or ITC and/or Partners of this Contest, shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of India.

Privacy Policy ITC Limited welcomes you to its website and looks forward to a meaningful interaction with you. ITC Limited respects an individual's right to privacy. This policy lays down our practices with respect to confidentiality and disclosure of personal information. Please familiarize yourself with our privacy practices, as given below. Should you choose to share your personal information with ITC Limited, it will be assumed that you have no objection to the terms of this privacy policy. Collection of Personal Information ITC Limited collects personal information only when it is required for business purposes. While collecting any personal information, ITC Limited indicates the purpose of collection of such information and obtains the consent of the provider of the information in writing. ITC Limited gives the person providing the information an option of not providing the information. He also has the option of withdrawing his consent given earlier. In such cases, ITC Limited may choose not to provide any services/supply goods for which the information was necessary. While collecting information, ITC Limited or any entity authorized on its behalf to collect information takes such steps as are, in the circumstances, reasonable to ensure that the person providing the information has the knowledge of - the fact that the information is being collected the purpose for which the information is being collected; and the intended recipients of the information The providers of information are permitted, as and when requested by them, to review the information they had provided. Confidentiality and Disclosure of personal information The terms of confidentiality and disclosure of personal information will be recorded in the non-disclosure agreement that may be entered into with the provider of the information. ITC Limited has also adopted reasonable security practices and procedures comprising of managerial, technical, operational and physical security control measures with a view to ensure confidentiality and prevent unauthorized disclosure of personal information. ITC Limited uses the personal information only for the purpose for which the same has been furnished. ITC Limited does not retain information after the purpose for which it is furnished is accomplished unless the same is required to be retained under any law in force or for audit purposes. In such cases also, confidentiality of such information is maintained. Policy for Website usage Any personal information shared by you in this Website shall be kept confidential in accordance with ITC Limited's reasonable security practices and procedures. Personal information, shared by you, shall be used for doing the intended business with you. ITC Limited assures you that in the event of your personal information being shared by ITC Limited with its subsidiaries, business associates etc., such sharing of information shall be for the purpose of doing the intended business with you. You hereby grant your consent to ITC Limited to share such information with its subsidiaries, business associates etc. ITC Limited reserves its rights to collect, analyse and disseminate aggregate site usage patterns of all its visitors with a view to enhance its services to the visitors. This includes sharing the information with its subsidiaries and business associates as a general business practice. In the course of its business, ITC Limited may hold on-line contests and surveys as permitted by law and it reserves its right to use and disseminate the information so collected to enhance its services to the visitors. This shall also include sharing the information with its subsidiaries and business associates as a general business practice. Cookies: - To personalize your experience on ITC Limited's Website or to support one of its promotions, ITC Limited may assign your computer browser a unique random number (cookie). "Cookies" enhance website performance in important ways like personalizing your experience, or making your visit more convenient. Your privacy and security will not be compromised when you accept a "cookie" from ITC Limited's Website. ITC Limited shall not be responsible in any manner whatsoever for any violation or misuse of your personal information by unauthorised persons consequent to misuse of the internet environment.

THIS PAGE CONTAINS THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS TO THE SUNFEAST FANTASTIK 4D RAISE THE BAR CONTEST TERMS AND CONDITIONS ABOUT THE CONTEST 1. The “Sunfeast Fantastik 4D Raise the Bar Contest” (the “Contest”) is organised by ITC Limited (“ITC”). 2. Consumers participating or seeking to participate in the Contest shall individually be referred to as “Participant” and collectively as “Participants”. 3. If you are a Participant below the age of 18 years, your parent(s)/legal guardian hereby provide consent on your behalf to enter into the Contest and to stand a chance to win prizes as per the terms & conditions set forth herein. Failure to provide such consent will result in disqualification from this Contest. 4. Participation in this Contest is purely voluntary. By participating in this Contest, each Participant is deemed to have accepted the complete terms and conditions of this Contest available on https://sunfeastfantastik.com/raisethebar.html (“Contest Website”) as well as the decisions of ITC, which are final and binding in all matters related to the Contest. Successfully entering the Contest and winning a prize is subject to all requirements set forth herein. 5. ITC reserves right to terminate, modify or extend this Contest, at its absolute discretion, without assigning any reason whatsoever including extending, withdrawing, or discontinuing the same without notice, at its sole and absolute discretion and without any liability. All decisions of ITC in respect of the Contest and the prizes therein will be final and binding. 6. The Contest shall be live from 00:00 hours on August 22, 2025 and end at 11:59 hours on September 25, 2025 7. The Contest is subject to all applicable central, state and local laws and regulations. 8. Purchase of the Sunfeast Fantastik 4D pack is not required to participate in this Contest. 9. The Contest shall be run on the sunfeastfantastik website available on https://sunfeastfantastik.com/raisethebar.html 10. This Contest is in no way sponsored, endorsed, administed by or associated with Instagram. Each Participant is deemed to have released Instagram from any claims and liabilities that may specifically arise in relation to their participation in this Contest by accepting these terms & conditions. ELIGIBILITY 11. Only Indian citizens residing in India are eligible to participate in this Contest. Participants below the age of 18 years can participate only with the consent of their parent(s)/legal guardian. 12. In order to be eligible for the prize, all Participants will be required to have valid address proof, government issued photo identity proof such as PAN Card/ Driver’s license/Voter ID/valid passport etc, or parent(s)/legal guardian’s consent, if applicable, a copy of which will have to be submitted at the request of ITC, without which the Participant will be disqualified from the Contest. 13. ITC reserves the right to exclude any person from the Contest on the grounds of: (i) misconduct or criminal record; (ii) tampering with the Entry process or the operation of Contest; (iii) acting in violation of these terms and conditions; (iv) acting in an unsportsmanlike or disruptive manner or with intent to annoy, abuse, threaten or harass any other person; or (v) for any other reasons, as it may deem fit and proper. No communication in this regard will be entertained. STEPS TO PARTICIPATE 14. To participate in the Contest, a Participants should follow the following steps: a) Choose the answer from the multiple options available on the link https://sunfeastfantastik.com/raisethebar.html and mention the reason for the choice in the text input box. 15. Submitted answers must inter alia comply with the following guidelines: a) All comments submitted must comply with these Terms & Conditions and terms of use of the Contest Website; b) Cannot be sexually explicit or suggestive, violent or derogatory of any ethnic, racial, gender, religious, professional or age group, profane or pornographic, or contain nudity; c) Cannot promote alcohol, illegal drugs, firearms/weapons (or the use of any of the foregoing), any activities that may appear unsafe or dangerous, or any particular political agenda or message; d) Cannot be obscene or offensive, endorse any form of hate or hate group; e) Cannot promote terrorist acts such as providing instructions on how to assemble bombs, grenades and other such weapons or provide instructional information about illegal activities; f) Cannot defame, misrepresent or contain disparaging or slanderous remarks about ITC, its customers or its products, or other people, products or companies; g) Must be original and cannot contain copyrighted materials owned by others (including photographs, sculptures, paintings and other works of art, stills, or images published on or in television, movies, the Internet or other media) without permission and cannot be plagiarized from any source; h) Cannot contain background artwork, unless it is an original work of the Participant; i) Cannot communicate messages or images inconsistent with the positive images and/or goodwill to which ITC wishes to associate; j) Cannot depict, and cannot itself, be in violation of any law. k) Participants making statements which are contrary to existing law, bye-laws, public policy or established good practices shall be disqualified from further participating in the Contest. SELECTION OF WINNERS 16. 5 winners will win a prize from ITC. 17. The winners will be chosen by judges appointed by the ITC Sunfeast Fantastik brand team based on the creativity of the comments. The decision of the judges shall be final and binding upon all the participants. PRIZE 18. For the purpose of this Contest, “Winners” mens Participants who have won the Prize. “Prize” means the Prize won by a Winner(s), details of which are elaborated in Clause 19 below. 19. “Prize”: Selected winners based on the most creative comments chosen as per ITC’s discretion will receive the following rewards: 1 user – Voucher worth Rs. 10,000 4 users – Voucher worth Rs. 500 CONTACTING WINNERS 20. Post the completion of the Contest, ITC shall contact each Participant who has won. ITC will inform the Participant by a message via Instagram that they have won the prize. The Winner is required to provide their mobile number and any other details as may be requested. These details are required for the Winner to be contacted. Without these details, the Winner shall stand disqualified from the Contest. 21. In the event the Winner does not respond to the message in 3 days, the Winner’s participation in the Contest comes to an end and the Winner’s entry stands cancelled and Winner becomes ineligible to receive the prize. In such an event, another Winner will be shortlisted by ITC. 22. The Winners will have to provide a copy of their or their parent(s)/legal guardian’s address proof such as valid passport, voter card, or driver’s license, a copy of which will have to be submitted at the request of ITC, without which the Participant may be disqualified from the Contest. 23. No Prize will be awarded if the information provided by the Participant at the time of entering the Contest is not factually correct. The prize will be awarded to the Winner only after the formalities mentioned herein are fulfilled. 24. The list of those Winners whose details have been verified shall be published at https://sunfeastfantastik.com/raisethebar/terms-and-conditions.html after the Contest, on 01.10.25 date. 25. By sharing their/their parent(s)/legal guardian’s personal information with ITC, the Participants/their parent(s)/legal guardian consent to collection, storing, processing and use of personal information i.e. name, address, mobile phone number by ITC, its affiliates, associates, agents, contractors and other third parties. The personal information is being collected by ITC and shall be retained by ITC. 26. Personal information given by the Participants/ their parent(s)/legal guardians shall be used to deliver prizes and for promotional activities by ITC Ltd its affiliates, associates, agents, contractors. 27. By participating in this Contest, the Participants/their parent(s)/legal guardians acknowledge and consent to transfer and/or disclosure of their personal information by ITC to any third-party for providing services in relation to this Contest. 28. The Participants have an option of not providing the personal information as required under this Contest. The Participants also have an option to withdraw their consent in relation to usage of Personal Information during the duration of the Contest. In such cases, the entry of the Participant shall not be considered and Participant shall not be eligible for the prize. The participants may reach out to itccares@itc.in for such withdrawals. PUBLICITY 29. The Participant undertakes and irrevocably and unconditionally permits ITC to cover the Contest through various media including newspapers, radio television news channels, internet, point of sale materials, etc., and shall not raise any objection, protest or demur to such coverage or in this regard. 30. At the request of ITC, Participants shall participate in all activities relating to the Contest surrounding the winning of the Prize, free of charge including participating in any photography/videography session, interviews etc., and they consent to ITC using their name and image in promotional material. 31. By participating in the Contest, all Participants agree that ITC shall be at liberty to use the Participant’s name and/or photo and/or video and/or entry and that may appear in any advertisements/promotions/media coverage or publicity in any form which exists today or will be known anytime in the future, without any consideration to the Participant and/or the Winners. No fees or other sums are to be paid to the Participants or Winners on account of taking part in the aforementioned advertisements / promotions and they shall not raise any objection, protest or demur to such coverage or in this regard. TERMS & CONDITIONS FOR THE PRIZE 32. The Prize Winner shall follow the instructions given by or on behalf of ITC, when a message is sent to him/her by ITC informing him/her in the event of his/her selection as the prize Winner. 33. Award of Prize is subject to the verification of documents such as (government Photo-ID proof such as valid Indian passport /residence proof/ Driver’s license PAN card and/or such other documents as may be requested and submitted by the prize Winner. After verification the prize Winner will be informed about the entire process of redemption of the Prize. GENERAL CONDITIONS 34. The decision of ITC, as regards the selection of Winners and distribution of the prizes shall be final, subject only to ITC’s approval. No correspondence or any other claims whatsoever, in this regard will be entertained. 35. All right, title and interest, including but not limited to, the intellectual property rights in the Contest and the promotional materials, all data collected as a result of this Contest and in any and all responses received shall vest solely and exclusively with ITC. ITC shall be entitled to use the responses received or any information in connection with the Entry in any media for future promotional, marketing, publicity and any other purpose without permission or payment to the Participant. 36. ITC may use such material in the manner as it may deem fit. 37. ITC reserves the right to change, defer, alter or cancel this Contest in part or full, or change any or all of the terms and conditions that are applicable, without giving prior intimation/notice of any kind and will not be liable for any consequential losses/damages. Any decision of ITC in this regard and in general with respect to this Contest and the terms and conditions thereto shall be final, binding and non-contestable. 38. The decision of ITC shall be final in all regards and no communication shall be entertained in this regard. None of the provisions of these Terms and Conditions shall be deemed to constitute a partnership or agency between any Participant and ITC and the Participant shall not have the authority to bind ITC in any manner whatsoever. 39. ITC accepts no responsibility for loss of internet connectivity, claims or correspondence whether due to error, omission, alteration, tampering, unauthorized data hacking, deletion, theft, destruction, virus attack, transmission interruption, communications failure, hardware failure or otherwise. ITC shall not be liable for any consequences of user error including (without limitation) costs incurred. RELEASE AND LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY 42. ITC shall under no circumstances be liable, whether jointly or severally, for any loss or damage suffered or sustained (including but not limited to consequential loss), including for personal injury or property damage suffered or sustained or any costs incurred, as a result of acceptance of any Prize. 43. By entering the Contest, the Participant hereby releases from and agrees to indemnify ITC and/ or any of its respective officers/employees from and against all liability, cost, loss or expense arising out of acceptance of the prize or participation in the Contest including (but not limited to) personal injury and damage to property and whether direct, indirect, consequential, foreseeable, due to some negligent act or omission, or otherwise. 44. SUNFEAST FANTASTIK CASHB ACK CARNIVAL CONTEST TERMS & CONDITIONS 1. This Sunfeast Fantastik Cashback Carnival Contest (“Contest”) is launched by ITC Limited. The Contest is organized by Mobilnxt India Pvt. Ltd. . This Contest is open only to wholesalers and retailers, who are of age 18 years and above as on 20/05/2025. 2. Retailers/Wholesalers participating or seeking to participate in the Contest shall individually be referred to as "Participant" and collectively as "Participants". If you participate in the Contest on behalf of a business entity, you represent that you have the requisite capacity and authority to accept these terms and conditions ( hereinafter referred to as the “Terms & Conditions”) on behalf of the business entity. 3. Participation in this Contest is purely voluntary. Participation in this Contest implies unconditional acceptance of these Terms. 4. By participating in this Contest, each Participant is deemed to have read, understood and accepted the complete terms and conditions of this Contest available on www.sunfeastfantastik.com/tpromo (“Contest Website") as well as the decisions of ITC which are final and binding in all matters related to the Contest. Successfully entering the Contest and winning a prize/prize(s) is subject to all requirements set forth herein. ELIGIBILITY: 1. This Contest is open to residents of India only. 2. Participants below 18 years of age are not allowed to participate in this Contest. 3. This Contest begins on 20.05.2025 (“Contest Period”). No entry will be entertained after 15 th Aug 2025. 4. This Contest is applicable only on wholesale packages containing Sunfeast Fantastik Fruit n Nut Rs. 10 at 13.5 g and Sunfeast Fantastik Choco Almond Rs. 10 at 12.5 g. 5. This Contest is subject to all applicable central, state and local laws and regulations. 6. The following persons are not eligible to participate in the Contest: employees, agents, associates, and promoters of ITC’s and of its affiliates, subsidiaries, and advertisement agencies including their immediate family members (spouse, parent, child, sibling, grandparent and/or “step”) and all others directly associated with organizing the Contest. 7. ITC reserves the right to cancel/amend/extend the Contest Period without giving any notice/intimation. No claims /questions shall be entertained in this regard. STEPS TO PARTICIPATE: 1. To participate in this Contest, Participants should follow these steps – a. Purchase any wholesale package of Sunfeast Fantastik Fruit n Nut Rs. 10 at 13.5 g and Sunfeast Fantastik Choco Almond Rs. 10 at 12.5 g. (hereinafter referred to as the “OUTER”) during the Contest Period. Each OUTER will contain a pamphlet with a Unique Code (hereinafter referred to as “Code”) b. Scan the QR Code on the pamphlet. The QR Code will redirect you to the Contest Website https://fantastikcarnival.com The Participants will have to enter their name, mobile number, e-mail id, State and UPI ID as prompted. c. Accept the terms and conditions on the Contest Website. d. The Participants should enter the Code provided on the pamphlet inside the OUTER. e. Once the Code is validated, the Participants will receive the assured cashback of Rs. 10 in their bank account through the UPI ID used to enter into the Contest (hereinafter referred to as “Cashback”). f. The Participant can purchase multiple OUTERs and follow the same steps provided above to avail higher Cashback amounts. The details of Cashback are as follows: i. Purchase of 2nd OUTER – Assured Cashback of Rs. 15 on the 2nd OUTER ii. Purchase of 3rd OUTER – Assured Cashback of Rs. 20 on the 3rd OUTER iii. Purchase of 4th OUTER – Assured Cashback of Rs. 25 on the 4th OUTER iv. Purchase of 5th or more OUTER – Assured Cashback of Rs. 50 on each OUTER subsequent to the 5th OUTER. g. The Participants will have to enter the same name and mobile number for each repeat purchase of the OUTER to avail the Cashback detailed above. h. For one Mobile Number the maximum limit which can be claimed through this contest is Rs.2,500/- 2. Participants will have to share their correct UPI ID and the transfer will be done only to the UPI ID provided by the Participants. 3. If a Participant has purchased an OUTER with the Code before the commencement of the Contest Period, then the Participant will be ineligible for participation in the Contest until the start of Contest Period i.e., 20/05/2025. A Participant who has purchased an OUTER during the Contest Period, can redeem the cashback till ¬¬¬15th July 2025. Participants who have purchased a OUTER with the Code after the end of the Contest Period will be ineligible to participate in the Contest and their participation will be rejected. 4. The disbursement of the Cashback will be only through the method stated herein, and disbursement through any other form is not permissible. 5. Participants may submit multiple entries in this Contest basis the number of wholesale packages purchased. 6. The pamphlet containing the Code cannot be exchanged for cash/vouchers/credit notes. The pamphlet will not be replaced if lost. 7. ITC reserves the right to change the Terms & Conditions of this Contest, including extending, withdrawing, or discontinuing the same without notice, without assigning any reason, at its sole discretion, without any liability. ITC shall not be liable in any manner for any claim arising out of, or in respect of this Contest. 8. ITC shall not be responsible for (i) any incorrect or incomplete details provided by the participant and/or delay in receipt of communication and/or non-receipt of communication for any reason whatsoever, (ii) any charges, levies, costs if incurred by the participants to participate in this Contest, (iii) any loss of data due to server issues and other technical faults that may occur during real time monitoring of the submission of entries, (iv) errors, omissions, interruptions, deletions, defects, delays in operation or transmission, theft, destruction, unauthorized access or alteration by a participant or third party. ITC, in its sole discretion, reserves the right to disqualify any person tampering with the operation of the Contest, or engaging in fraudulent or unethical behaviour, or violating or otherwise not meeting these Terms. 9. Sunfeast Fantastik is an exclusive trademark / brand of ITC. 10. ITC reserves the right to exclude any person from participating in the Contest on grounds of misconduct or criminal record. 11. ITC reserves the right to terminate, modify or extend the Contest, at any time at its absolute discretion, without assigning any reasons. 12. If this Contest is interfered with in any way or is not capable of being conducted as reasonably anticipated due to any reason beyond the reasonable control of ITC, including but not limited to technical difficulties, unauthorized intervention or fraud, ITC reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to the fullest extent permitted by law (a) to invalidate any Participant; or (b) subject to any written directions from a regulatory authority, to modify, suspend, terminate or cancel the Contest, as appropriate. 13. If for any reason this Contest is not capable of running as planned because of infection by computer virus, bugs, tampering, unauthorized intervention, technical failures or any other causes beyond the reasonable control of ITC, which corrupt or affect the administration, security, fairness, integrity or proper conduct of this Contest, ITC reserves the right in its sole discretion to cancel, terminate, modify or suspend the Contest. 14. By sharing their personal information with Mobilnxt India Pvt. Ltd.the Participants consent to collection, storage, processing and usage of personal information i.e., Name, Mobile number, e-mail, State, Pin code, UPI ID details by Mobilnxt India Pvt. Ltd.,, its affiliates, associates, agents and contractors and other third parties. 15. Personal information given by the Participants shall be used for promotional activities by ITC, its affiliates, associates, agents, contractors. The personal information is being collected by Mobilnxt India Pvt. Ltd.,and shall be retained by Mobilnxt India Pvt. Ltd., 16. The Participants have an option of not providing the personal information as required under this Contest. The Participants also have an option to withdraw their consent in relation to usage of personal information during the Contest Period.
